title.en: I Want to Dote on My Wife Day And Night

altTitles.en: Ore Wa Tsuma ni Mainichi Maiban Oboretai
俺は妻に毎日毎晩溺れたい(単話版)

description.en:
Batoto Scans :
“I prepared it for you, Yoshi-kun…”

“Eh!! What?!! My favorite Yuki-chan’s pussy…?!

Yuki’s husband, Yoshi-kun, still loves his wife’s pussy as usual. The two of them have gotten used to their naïve newlywed life and are happily preparing for a relaxing trip to a hot spring.

One day, Yoshi-kun suddenly hears the phrase "sexual harassment between marriage couple" and becomes worried that might also apply to his action…

The impatient Yoshi-kun imposes himself into mode "Yuki-chan self-control" up to the hot springs, but...?

He can't hold back when his favorite dish (his wife, Yuki) is in front of him!!

This is the “simmering surprise H” story between (A husband who loves his wife too much) vs. (A wife with her pure love)
